title: Auslan Deaf Summoners Club.
body:
{{summoner:2}} 
Hello!

Calling all people who dream in sign, pictures and thoughts.
Hearing or Deaf or even those in between.
 I am a hearing summoner, who is currently studying Auslan at Central TAFE, Perth WA.

I want to create a group, club, community place where we (and other like minded people) can meet up, hang out and play League. Maybe you're deaf, hard of hearing, or a hearie and know sign, or just know people, friends or family that are deaf... Then I am signing to you...

Leave your name, join the Facebook group, and let's game on.
If you live in **Perth, Western Australia**... EVEN BETTER.
We can arrange meet ups and maybe RIOT sponsored events.

Together, we can influence RIOT to Caption their broadcasts, and although they've already done a lot visually to make people from all walks of life, THERE is still STUFF that could be done for the Deaf. (I feel)

Come one. Come all. All Ages Welcome.

**Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/537333886433998/
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/AuslanDeafSummonersClub
Email: adsclub.lol@gmail.com
Instagram: adsclub.lol
League Chat Group: Deaf Summoners Club**
(Add me to get an Invite... I thought you could search for it... soz)

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Hey BaconPoroDeluxe
Its great that you've started this club. My family has a history of deafness, so this is close to my heart. 
Best of luck getting everything set up, I'd love to hear about your first event. 
Thanks
Ivan

Hi Everyone, Looking at setting up an Auslan Interpreted Event for the OPL Finals @ Game City in the Perth Underground. Near Raine Square. More Details to come... But I require your input.

What would you like to see at this event?
Do you have a laptop to bring?
Do you want Parental Units to be there, or maybe just some really cool nerdy Auslan adults who will look after you...
Can you afford $5?
Would you rather the profits if any, go towards the lovely guys at Game City or the WA Deaf Society?

Thanks very much,



{{summoner:2}} 
Alvin.K
Speak up, I can't hear you.
Idk how I feel about this
